member.name: P:Infraestructura.Repositorio.My.Resources.Resources.BuscarCliente
member.summary:
Busca una cadena traducida similar a declare @sqlquery varchar(max)
set @sqlquery=' where 1=1 '
IF (@id is not null and @id <>0) set @sqlquery = @sqlquery + ' AND ID = '''+ @id+''''
IF @cliente is not null and @cliente<>'' set @sqlquery = @sqlquery + ' AND CLIENTE ='''+ @cliente+''''
IF (@telefono <> null or @telefono <>'') set @sqlquery = @sqlquery + ' AND TELEFONO ='''+ @telefono+''''
IF (@correo <> null or @correo <>'') set @sqlquery = @sqlquery + ' AND CORREO ='''+ @correo+''''
exec('select* from clientes ' + [resto de la cadena truncado]";.

member.name: P:Infraestructura.Repositorio.My.Resources.Resources.BuscarVenta
member.summary:
Busca una cadena traducida similar a declare @sqlquery varchar(max)
set @sqlquery=' where 1=1 '
IF (@id is not null and @id <>0) set @sqlquery = @sqlquery + ' AND ID = '''+ @id+''''
IF @cliente is not null and @cliente<>'' set @sqlquery = @sqlquery + ' AND IDCLIENTE ='''+ @idcliente+''''
IF (@telefono <> null or @telefono <>'') set @sqlquery = @sqlquery + ' AND FECHA ='''+ @fecha+''''
exec('select* from ventas ' + @sqlquery)
.
